_comment.mode: modes: debug, info, warn, error, off
_comment.name: name: filename
_comment.console: Whether output will be printed to console, too.

_comment.no_feedback: If no feedback is in the answer object, this string will be used.
_comment.missing_text: When a answer has no response, this text will be used.
_comment.overall_text: The submission will be evaluated and depending on the points, max (maximum points reached), pass or fail will be used.
